idea:
Tender Skin International Cosmetology Academy was Established in 2001 TSICA is dedicated on providing comprehensive clinical education with focus on hands on training with its own integrated online platform for Indian & International students Our course curriculum is devised by a renowned dermatologist & internationally published author of two books on study of clinical cosmetology - Dr Sonia Tekchandani. We have trained over 5000 students across India & abroad with successful cosmetology practitioners working in India, Dubai, Sri Lanka, Singapore & USA.

TSICA has launched an initiative in offering a special scheme to provide skills for 5 job roles in courses like Cosmetology Therapies, Laser Treatment, Hair & Scalp Treatments & Weight loss & Diet Management. This scheme gives opportunities for students to learn at a nominal fee & this scholarship is provided to students who are eager to learn these courses but are unable to afford them at various institutes. This scheme is implemented with the objective to enable a large number of women youth to take up industry-relevant skill training that will help them in securing a better livelihood. Students with prior learning experience and skill sets will be considered for priority admissions & will be eligible to be enrolled into the government certified courses offered at TSICA.

Objective of our academy is to enable high employability and career oriented courses so as to fulfil the skilled manpower requirements in skin & hair clinics across the country. Our goal is to transform the learning for vocational studies. We aspire on raising the bar and setting highest standards for aesthetics practitioners. We focus on extensive hands on trainings for all of our students.
name: TENDERSKIN INTERNATIONAL COSMETOLOGY ACADEMY

idea:
ADMOTT is a revolutionary pluggable ad technology for digital advertising for seamless integration for content-based ad recommendation in live video streaming using AI/ML techniques across premium OTT (Mobile/CTV) and streaming channels in connected tv (CTV) platforms. Bespoke Ad/Brand placements can seamlessly integrate into the actual fabric of the content in real-time and non-intrusive.


Our in-content native solution will be delivered programmatically and will be integrated with supply-side platform (SSP) and Demand Side Platforms (DSP).
name: ADMOTT LLP

idea: - Suxes consultancy is a business consultancy firm which aims to help other businesses and startups with their business operations. We have industry specific experts who offer professional advice, guidance, and actionable solutions to businesses experiencing issues they can’t deal with in-house. Suxes Consultancy insists that you focus on your core business & we will take care all your problems in non-core functions. Suxes Consultancy supports right people for right cause.
name: SUXES CONSULTANCY LLP
